channel.title: Florin Ungur's website
channel.description: The website of Florin Ungur (pronounced Flo•REEN Un•gur), a guy that likes computers, philosophy, psychology, and Hunter S. Thompson.

item.title: Hello world!
item.description: Pinning the philosophy of what is to come (when it comes to content on this website).
